name: Running Cat
description:
Hello this is a casual game that I made for my learning in Unity. This game is created by using Unity 2017+ this is compiled using Unity 2018.3.0b5, the updated for Unity 2019. This is the 3rd time I rewrite the game, I found that it have memory leaks and had performance issues now this time works very smooth.

This project is a personal project, the game is not really hard to play.

Press the Mouse Left Click Button to Run.

Unpress the Mouse Left click to stop.

Collect all the fish points and avoid all obstacles.
